verbose_text: After lipid conjugation the drug-lipid complexes are retained there, making it available for binding to glucocorticoid receptors (GR) for longer duration (similar to a slow release preparation) prolonging the PRT of the ICS, making it convenient for single daily dosing [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: GR) for longer duration (similar to a slow release preparation) prolonging the PRT of the ICS
